legacy.full_text: Russia plans to send cosmonauts to the Moon next decade for the first time in its history and intends to build a moon base from 2031, state news agency TASS reported Wednesday. https://t.co/2ej6S2IYus

legacy.full_text: #SpaceX is hoping to relaunch Starship, the most powerful rocket ever built, as early as November 17, pending final regulatory approval, the company said, after an attempt in April ended in an explosion. https://t.co/UiKF5CqtsQ

legacy.full_text: The 25th China Hi-Tech Fair (CHTF) kicked off on Wednesday in S China's Shenzhen. About 4,925 enterprises from 105 countries and regions are participating in the fair, making this year's fair the #largest ever. https://t.co/uGYoaB0x6y

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists have completed tests on the first batch of 22 biological samples that were exposed to space outside the China Space Station before being brought back to Earth by the Shenzhou-16 crew, according to the space application system of China's Manned Space Program. https://t.co/HTvEyrmIvv

legacy.full_text: A total of 1,275 Chinese scientists were selected for the Highly Cited Researchers list issued by the major global science data analyzer Clarivate on Wednesday, with China ranking second globally. https://t.co/03hoQlrYHy

legacy.full_text: China's most powerful and efficient F-class #GasTurbine M701F5 rolled off the production line on Tue in SW China's Sichuan. The machine will serve a power plant that can generate 3.266 bln kWh of electricity per year while saving 100 mln m3 of #NaturalGas in S China's Guangdong. https://t.co/tk6uuPTqPU

legacy.full_text: New record! China's Yuejin 3-3 well in Tarim Basin became the deepest #well in Asia as it reached its target depth of 9,432 m on Wednesday after 170 days of drilling through 9 strata. Meanwhile, the evaluation of the #oil and #gas reservoir is underway. #AsiaRecord https://t.co/WEawXKUWMm

legacy.full_text: The world's largest vertically-bored underground smart garage in #Shanghai saw No.1 shaft bottom sealed at a depth of 52m after completion of the drilling by China's homegrown world’s largest-diameter vertical shaft boring machine. The 19-story garage can park 304 vehicles. https://t.co/GxQqJuf8L7

legacy.full_text: The 5th batch of space science experiment samples from #Tiangong Space Station were delivered to their respective project units Tue. The samples, incl. those from China's new generation space microgravity materials science facility, returned with #Shenzhou16 spacecraft on Oct 31. https://t.co/xWGMNDwDtF

legacy.full_text: Alpha90, China's 1st unmanned truck for general transportation at open pit mines, was put into use recently in NW China. Without a driving cab, the truck is available for remote control, replacing manual work in hazardous environments for workers' safety. #AutonomousVehicles https://t.co/zEj0usZAa1

legacy.full_text: China's installed capacity of distributed photovoltaic power generated by households reached about 105 million kilowatts by the end of September, covering more than 5 million households in the country's rural areas, National Energy Administration (NEA) data showed. https://t.co/3x4tPeLhwn

legacy.full_text: An #AI-driven robotic chemist developed by Chinese scientists has automatically synthesized and intelligently optimized catalysts for the oxygen evolution reaction from Martian meteorites, offering a solution for the production of oxygen on #Mars. (Journal Nature Synthesis) https://t.co/0RN1dmGxx9

legacy.full_text: A Chinese research team recently published their significant progress in the field of ultra-fast gated framing technology. Researchers obtained laser implosion images with a time resolution of less than 10 picoseconds, a #first for gated framing technology developed in China. https://t.co/KQHSy5Lj6o

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists have confirmed the #first live birth of a monkey with a high proportion of cells derived from a monkey stem cell line, which paves the way for scientists to use chimeric primates to study human diseases, said a study published in the journal Cell. https://t.co/zrUHwaGAae

legacy.full_text:
How thin can stainless steel be?

A Chinese company has presented the world's thinnest stainless steel with a mere 0.015mm using self-developed manufacturing facility. This ultra-thin hand-torn steel will be applied in sectors incl. aerospace and electronics. #TechBreakthrough https://t.co/qghBUnOEWL

legacy.full_text: China's Bozhong 19-6 gas field, the first 100-billion-cubic-meter gas field in the Bohai Sea, saw its phase I project begin operation on Tuesday, marking the country's breakthrough in the exploration of offshore deep buried hill #oil and #gas reservoirs. #naturalresources https://t.co/ts13kaicCO

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists have identified the world's earliest Bauhinia, Bauhinia tibetensis, in #fossils from the southern Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, showing the genus started to evolve into distinct clades 59.7 million years ago as it spread to Asia and North America. https://t.co/v2fGCyGaPE

legacy.full_text: China's meteorological #satellite Fengyun-3F, launched in August, has started in-orbit tests with the first set of high-precision images released on Monday. The member of the Fengyun family will officially launch pilot operations next March and offer global data services. https://t.co/VnC8Vc6uzA
